title: thinking of starting an unpopular mains club
body:
Call it lemon champ mains club

For people who main champs that arn't popular or are  just considered bad by the rest of the populace.


Anyone interested?

replies.body: poor guys, give them some love people

I have no clue why half those champions aren't popular since for instance swain, sejuani, rumble and moawkai are still strong and mundo just received a substantial buff for pushing towers and trading harder midgame due to his e giving him 20 more ad and a shorter cd by 1s which makes his all in just that little bit more terrifying . Also I've seen some ziggs players do some serious work pushing down towers with his reworked ability being able to execute lowish health towers with 1 ability.
ive seen everyone of those champs destroy people, its just rare as hell.
This is a crap idea, champs are generally considered bad because (surprise surprise) they are! Be a meta slave and climb 10x easier
Cool story.don't join then? Maybe im trying to make a club for fun and give no fucks for winning or ranking up?
That's why you're in low elo!

and we care why? also in your previous posts you mentioned you were unranked. So how you can presume that you are any better?

Anyways, some of us play champions because we enjoy their kits, or we find we perform much better with them. 
We never condemned playing meta champions; however we are not obliged to feel inferior simply because we enjoy playing off-meta champions that are currently a little under powered.

Also I feel most importantly, the best champion for you to pick and climb the ladder with, should be the champion you are strongest as and can shine most brilliantly with on a team. An expert urgot for instance is better than a noob zed.

what about champions who are considered bad but actually have really high winrates and are hidden op. Such as Zilean, my plat friend thinks it's a terrible support but look at his winrate and his play/banrate is so low that I doubt he's getting nerfed anytime soon.
Zilean is a great champ, I would say he's better off played in mid than at support though

his winrates in both mid and support are both approximately the same for high elo and he's always been more meta as a support even though mid zilean is making a comeback. Not to mention midlane zilean has much weaker winrates than support zilean in low elo. I play him as both a midlaner and a support depending on which role I get in ranked (which ends up being support 100% of the time).
